channel.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
channel.description:
Every time I try to get on, it says Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading Runescape. To fix this try the following(in order) 1.Close all browser windows and reloading - check, still not working 2.Try clearing cache - done, still not working 3.Try using different game world - I don't know if this even applies... 4.Try rebooting your computer - done, still broken 5.Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu - I don't think this applies either...
I have JDK 6 u.7 and JRE 6 u.7 which is the most updated I could find. I've searched the forums and I've seen tons of this exact question, but no one has posted an answer that helps. PLEASE help me.

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @red-shadow red-shadow
item.description:
@red-shadow wrote:

hi genuisdog i have same problem too i m try too many times but still not working
we problem correct answer not this board! because have many master!
i open 1 more topic all answer same restart-delete cookies-temp files-try other client-update java … result=0

when still working i send you PM!

Read full topic

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @genuisdog genuisdog
item.description:
@genuisdog wrote:

I tried uninstalling/reinstalling java and the client. No luck. Where do I do the hard refresh at?

I just noticed this in the text console under the game screen- “Error: loaderror bobStarting up 20” -any ideas what that means?

Mod, please lock this thread. I’m posting a new one with a more descriptive title.

Read full topic

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“genuisdog, post:8, topic:225967”][quote author=Tracytb link=topic=296860.msg2387850#msg2387850 date=1218846567]
lol push alt+F4

then if that dont work push ctrl F5 i think…
[/quote]
Screw you. If you’re not going to help then shut up. If your so smart with your little alt+F4 joke, then tell me, what should I do, hmm? How do I fix the problem I have? What is your genius input on whats wrong with my computer? Freaking moron.

Does anyone here have any real solutions?[/quote]

Sorry, but that was kinda funny. ~Back on topic: try uninstalling/re-installing Java

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @Server_King Server King
item.description:
@Server_King wrote:

I hate webclients, get the downloadable client! Easier to use and works to do some offline testing incase internet fails

I recommend you start practicing server making with this client and then move on to other player-made clients.
After that, you can try coding some 503+

PS: incase error persists in downloaded version, use google to download latest “Java” update

Read full topic

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @genuisdog genuisdog
item.description:
@genuisdog wrote:

HAHA very funny. Unless the real runescape loads from moparisthebest.com, or from the downloaded moparscape client, then no, I’m talking about moparscape. heres a pretty picture of it- Mopar not working

[quote=“Server King, post:3, topic:225967”]else if(command.startsWith("fail")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " fails."); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }[/quote]
btw, this is pretty funny, I’ll give you that.

Read full topic

item.title: Error whilst loading Moparscape, I've done all the steps, have recent Java
item.dc:creator: @Server_King Server King
item.description:
@Server_King wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("fail")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " fails."); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

Use a moparscape client, put this in client.java then compile.
After that, run the server and use the command

item.description:
@genuisdog wrote:

Every time I try to get on, it says
Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading Runescape.
To fix this try the following(in order)
1.Close all browser windows and reloading - check, still not working
2.Try clearing cache - done, still not working
3.Try using different game world - I don’t know if this even applies…
4.Try rebooting your computer - done, still broken
5.Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu - I don’t think this applies either…

I have JDK 6 u.7 and JRE 6 u.7 which is the most updated I could find. I’ve searched the forums and I’ve seen tons of this exact question, but no one has posted an answer that helps. PLEASE help me.
